raw_body: ANANDAPPA,​ HILARY – Loving husband of Chulanie,​ much loved father of Sashika and Vishwa Weerawardana,​ beloved son of Bede and late Queenie Anandappa,​ son-in-law of late Owsin and Lily Wijeratne,​ brother of Max,​ Frank,​ Carmel Canagasabey,​ Trevor,​ late Christine,​ Gladwyn,​ Pam Appathurai & Glossinda Solomonsz called to Rest with the Lord. Family & friends are invited to pay their respects at his residence 85/​3,​ Barnes Place,​ Colombo 7 from Wednesday 13 March. Cortege leaves residence at 4 p.m. on 14 March for Burial at Borella General Cemetery Kanatte RC Section.          017928
